description: This file is a shell script responsible for starting and stopping a network tunnel, likely an SSH tunnel. It manages network interface configurations, IP address retrieval, and initiates SSH connections based on device-specific parameters.

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays usage information for the script commands (start/stop).

methods.name: ip_to_hex
methods.description: Converts an IPv4 address to its hexadecimal representation.
